attributes.action: Scrap GCSE's in favour of teacher evaluation.
attributes.additional_details: It should be done because having 11 years of learning crammed into a 2 hour test puts to much pressure on a student and they might forget things where as teacher evaluations take all school work into consideration
attributes.background: Get rid of GCSE's in favour of evaluations made by teachers who have taught students and will take all available school work into consideration.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/318113
